semantic_description: Instrument RabbitMQ message publish/consume operations in the C# service so that Jaeger traces include dedicated spans with standard messaging attributes.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'queueName' passed to the publish/consume call

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.rabbitmq.routing_key
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'routingKey' from the BasicPublish/BasicConsume arguments

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' for send spans and 'receive' for consume spans

attributes_to_add.name: net.peer.name
attributes_to_add.value_source: the variable 'rabbitMqHostName' from the connection settings
